title: Cloud in a Balloon
summaries: The Cloud in a Balloon is an accessory that combines the functionality of the Cloud in a Bottle and the Shiny Red Balloon. It boosts jump height by 33%, and jump speed by 30%, increasing the player's first jump's height to 10.5 blocks (~75% increase), and provides a double jump that hits 9 blocks, for a total height of 19.5 blocks.
Jump height is oddly reduced when underwater, reducing your total underwater height from 15 blocks (8 + 7 from Cloud jump) to 13 blocks (7 + 6 from Cloud jump).
